detail_desc: Shirt in patterned Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Quilted jacket for a dog in woven fabric with a collar and opening for a leash at the back of the neck. Opening for the front legs and an adjustable hook and loop tab that fastens at the top. Narrow elastic straps for the back legs that help to keep the jacket in place. Lined.

Quilted jacket for a dog in woven fabric with a collar and opening for a leash at the back of the neck. Opening for the front legs and an adjustable hook and loop tab that fastens at the top. Narrow elastic straps for the back legs that help to keep the jacket in place. Lined.
Dog jacket in woven fabric with a hood and a hole for a leash at the back of the neck. Opening for the front legs and a hook and loop fastening underneath. Fleece lining.
Metal bangles in various designs, one decorated with pearly plastic beads.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Polo shirt in fine-knit premium cotton with a collar, button placket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Polo shirt in fine-knit premium cotton with a collar, button placket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Polo shirt in fine-knit premium cotton with a collar, button placket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Polo shirt in fine-knit premium cotton with a collar, button placket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Straight-cut shirt jacket in soft pile with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, front pockets and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a sheen. Stand-up collar, an opening at the front and a small opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Padded shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam below the bust and gathered seams in the sides for a draped effect. Unlined.
Knee-length twill shorts with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, diagonal side pockets and flap back pockets with concealed press-studs.
Knee-length twill shorts with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, diagonal side pockets and flap back pockets with concealed press-studs.
Knee-length twill shorts with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, diagonal side pockets and flap back pockets with concealed press-studs.
Hat in felted wool with an imitation leather band that has a metal decoration. Width of brim 9 cm.
Multi-strand necklace decorated with glass beads in various colours. Adjustable length 50-57 cm.
Long-sleeved, turtleneck body with a cut-out section at the front, an opening with buttons at the back of the neck, and press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the front.
Long-sleeved, turtleneck body with a cut-out section at the front, an opening with buttons at the back of the neck, and press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the front.

Short jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, high collar and zip down the front. Loose yoke front and back, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with appliqués at the front and hook and loop tab over the foot. Patterned soles.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with appliqués at the front and hook and loop tab over the foot. Patterned soles.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs.
Boots in imitation leather with a padded top edge, lacing at the front, zip in one side and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Knee-length shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and contrasting colour side stripes.
Boots in imitation leather with a padded top edge, lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
Metal and plastic earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from 2.7 cm to 4.5 cm.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Three pairs of hoops with metal pendants and three pairs of earrings decorated with pearly plastic beads. Size from 1.8 cm to 2.5 cm.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a resort collar, French front, yoke at the back and straight-cut hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a resort collar, French front, yoke at the back and straight-cut hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a resort collar, French front, yoke at the back and straight-cut hem.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs, some decorated with pearly plastic beads.
Thin metal chain necklace with a pendant in the shape of a crescent moon, and a trigger clasp. Adjustable length 48-57 cm.
Thin metal chain necklace with a pendant in the shape of a crescent moon, and a trigger clasp. Adjustable length 48-57 cm.
Soft velour slippers in the shape of dinosaurs with appliqués and embroidery. Velour linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Jacket in soft, thermal fleece with a shimmering print. High collar, zip down the front with a chin guard at the top, and long raglan sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a decorative tie-detail at the hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a decorative tie-detail at the hem.
Shorts in soft, cool satin with an elasticated waist and lace panels down the sides.
Stud earrings in various designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 0.8 cm.
Stud earrings in various designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 0.8 cm.
Earrings in embossed metal with rectangular pendants. Length approx. 5 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Platform front approx. 3 cm, heel 6 cm.
Boots in cotton twill with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and chunky block heels. Lining and moulded insoles in cotton canvas. Heel 7 cm.
Boots in cotton twill with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and chunky block heels. Lining and moulded insoles in cotton canvas. Heel 7 cm.
Cotton canvas boots with toe caps and lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Long dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, smocking at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Long dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, smocking at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Long dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, smocking at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Long dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, smocking at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Long dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, smocking at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Wide blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a wide collar that ties at the front, and buttons at the top. Gathered yoke at back, gathers at the shoulders, long balloon sleeves and cuffs with a covered button.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. The underwiring is V-shaped at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. The underwiring is V-shaped at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. The underwiring is V-shaped at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. The underwiring is V-shaped at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless top in satin with a lace section at the top and a V-neck front and back.
Sleeveless top in satin with a lace section at the top and a V-neck front and back.
Sleeveless top in satin with a lace section at the top and a V-neck front and back.
Round-necked dress in airy, smocked jersey made from recycled polyester. Long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Fitted at the top, a seam at the hips and a wide skirt.
Short dress in a soft cable knit containing some wool with a stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.
High-waisted, calf-length skirt in sequined mesh with a concealed button and zip at the back. Jersey underskirt.
Turtleneck jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool and some alpaca wool. Extra-long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long dress in patterned chiffon crêpe with smocking at the shoulders, cuffs and waist. V-neck with ties at the top, long puff sleeves and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Boxy top in sequined mesh with a high collar and an opening at the back with concealed buttoning at the top. Low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.

Set with a top, pair of shorts and pair of tights. Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with frill trim over the shoulders and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts in a jacquard weave containing glittery threads with elastication at the back of the waistband, a fake fly with a press-stud, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Tights in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Set with a top, pair of shorts and pair of tights. Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with frill trim over the shoulders and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts in a jacquard weave containing glittery threads with elastication at the back of the waistband, a fake fly with a press-stud, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Tights in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Sequined hat in a soft knit with a faux fur pompom on top.
Sequined hat in a soft knit with a faux fur pompom on top.

Jacket for a dog in soft pile with a foldover collar and opening for a leash at the back of the neck. Decorative tab with buttons at the top, and two hook and loop tabs at the bottom. Narrow elastic straps for the back legs that help to keep the jacket in place. Pattern-knit lining.
Earrings in various sizes and designs. 21 pairs of small studs, two pairs of hoop earrings and two pairs with marbled pendants. Size from 0.2 cm to 3 cm.

Puffer jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and taped zip down the front. Side pockets with a taped zip, an inner pocket, ribbed cuffs and concealed, covered elastication at the hem. Polyester filling.

Puffer jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and taped zip down the front. Side pockets with a taped zip, an inner pocket, ribbed cuffs and concealed, covered elastication at the hem. Polyester filling.
